item.title: Introducing Litestream
item.description: What is Litestream? Litestream is a streaming replication tool for SQLite. It runs as a separate process and continuously streams WAL writes from your database to S3-compatible storage. If your server dies in a fire then you can run a single recovery command to quickly rebuild your database to its state at the point of failure.
